about_the_game:
Bonnie Blob in Shapeville

An Adorable Interactive Storybook Adventure for Kids!

Welcome to Shapeville, a colorful world filled with friendly shapes and endless fun! Meet Bonnie Blob, a bubbly little hero with a curious mind and a heart full of adventure. Along with her best friend Tiffany Triangle, Bonnie explores the whimsical corners of Shapeville, where every click brings something delightful to life!

📖Four Playful Adventures

This charming storybook game includes four interactive books, each with its own heartwarming tale:

- Bonnie’s Day Trip: Join Bonnie and her Mum on their day trip to see Tiffany Triangle!

- Bonnie’s Day at the Beach: Enjoy a sunny day full of sandcastles, meeting aquatic creatures, and beachy surprises!

- Bonnie’s Birthday: Help Bonnie celebrate her special day with friends, presents, and cake.

- The Quest for the Missing Puzzle Piece: Go on an adventure to find a lost puzzle piece with Bonnie and Tiffany’s help!

🎮 How to Play

Designed for kids ages 2 and up, the gameplay is simple and intuitive—just click on objects in each scene and watch them come to life with fun animations and cheerful sounds! There’s no pressure, no time limits, and no wrong way to play—perfect for little ones just learning how to interact with digital experiences.

🌈 Key Feature

- Engaging animations that bring the story and characters to life.

- Kid-friendly controls: just click and enjoy!

- Charming art and music that create a cozy, playful atmosphere.

- Ideal for parents and young children to enjoy together.

- Encourages exploration and curiosity through interactive scenes.

Give your little one a magical journey with Bonnie Blob and her friends! Whether it’s a beach day or a birthday party, there’s always something new to discover in Shapeville.

Bonnie Blob and Shapeville is a gentle, joyful experience that celebrates friendship, exploration, and fun - the perfect first adventure for your young gamer!

highlighted.name: Finish Quest for the Missing Puzzle Piece
Finish Bonnie's Day at the Beach
Score 4000 points in Easy Match Game
Score 6000 points in Medium Match Game
Score 10,000 points in Hard Match Game

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12.0
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz (Apple Silicon or Intel)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Bonnie Blob in Shapeville

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or later; NVIDIA GeForce GTX 700 or later; AMD Radeon R5 or later.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
